H0.text: Rahere, an Anglo-Norman monk, founded which London hospital in 1123. St Thomas' Hospital

H1.text: Rahere, an Anglo-Norman monk, founded which London hospital in 1123. Guy's Hospital

H2.text: Rahere, an Anglo-Norman monk, founded which London hospital in 1123. University College Hospital

H3.text: Rahere, an Anglo-Norman monk, founded which London hospital in 1123. Barts

A4.text: St Thomas' Hospital was named after St Thomas Becket and was founded after 1173 when Becket was canonised.

A5.text: Rahere founded the Hospital of St Bartholomew in 1123.
